original_text:
If grape pickers came to you,
    would they not leave a few grapes?
If thieves came during the night,
    would they not steal only as much as they wanted?
korean_text: 포도를 거두는 자들이 네게 이르면 약간의 열매도 남기지 아니하겠고 밤에 도둑이 오면 그 욕심이 차기까지 멸하느니라

sentences.original_text: If grape pickers came to you
would they not leave a few grapes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 몇 개의 포도를 남겨두지 않겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If thieves came during the night
would they not steal only as much as they wanted
